label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_014
content:
## 2026-01-16 Daily Operations Summary

### Metrics
#### zone_transfers
- AXFR requests: 30
- AXFR success percentage: 93.3
- IXFR requests: 202
- IXFR success percentage: 97.9
- Transfer average (ms): 760
- Transfer P95 (ms): 1950
- TSIG failures: 2

#### ttl_changes
- Records changed: 35
- Zones touched: 6
- TTL minimum (s): 120
- TTL maximum (s): 86400
- TTL median (s): 1800
- Rollbacks: 1

#### propagation
- Cloud edge sites: 36
- Propagation average (s): 98
- Propagation P95 (s): 275
- Stale answer percentage: 1.2

#### dns_queries
- QPS average: 22800
- QPS peak: 55200
- NX domain percentage: 2.3
- SERVFAIL percentage: 0.13
- UDP percentage: 95.7
- TCP fallback percentage: 2.1

- Zones signed: 70

- DS mismatch count: 0

- Auth response P95 (ms): 61.4
- EDNS0 present percentage: 72.0

#### errors
- Format error count: 18

- Truncation TC percentage: 1.2

- Zones total: 608
- Records total: 2157600
- Dynamic updates per hour: 390

#### compliance
- Zonefile lint errors: 8
- DNSSEC policy violations: 1
- Audit log gaps: 0

### Infrastructure
#### bind-master-01
- CPU percentage: 52
- Memory percentage: 70
- Disk used percentage: 76
- Net in (Mbps): 126
- Net out (Mbps): 172
- Open files: 1492
- NTP offset (ms): 2

#### bind-slave-02
- CPU percentage: 40
- Memory percentage: 62
- Disk used percentage: 57
- Net in (Mbps): 105
- Net out (Mbps): 120
- Open files: 1368
- NTP offset (ms): 2

#### cloud-dns-sync-01
- CPU percentage: 78
- Memory percentage: 83
- Disk used percentage: 52
- Net in (Mbps): 155
- Net out (Mbps): 198
- Queue depth: 14
- NTP offset (ms): 2

#### signer-01
- CPU percentage: 60
- Memory percentage: 84
- Disk used percentage: 62
- Net in (Mbps): 26
- Net out (Mbps): 30
- HSM slot utilization percentage: 69
- NTP offset (ms): 2

### Events
- Propagation delays increased after a large bulk TXT update (DKIM keys) across 6 zones; queue depth rose and stale answer sampling hit 1.2%.
- TSIG failures reappeared for two zones; discovered mismatched TSIG key secret due to stale secret in sync controller; rotated and redeployed secret store entry.
- One IaC change failed due to exceeding provider record-set size limits for aggregated TXT entries; split records and re-applied successfully.
- Detected lame delegation for one subzone after registrar glue update; corrected parent NS set and confirmed authoritative reachability.

### On Call
- Shift: N. Brooks
- Pages: 4
- Tickets: 10
- Status: Degraded during bulk TXT change; restored normal after secret rotation and record-set refactor.
